description: Definição de geração de ativos digitais do app Professor Virtual

params.prompt: Professional sound design for children's educational app: gentle satisfying button tap sound, Material Design inspired UI feedback, soft but crisp tactile response, warm wooden percussion quality, child-friendly mobile interface sound, exactly 0.5 seconds, non-startling, encouraging interaction
params.negative_prompt: loud, sharp, metallic, echo, harsh, aggressive, annoying, repetitive fatigue

params.prompt: Children's educational app success sound: bright cheerful completion chime, celebratory but not overwhelming, harmonious major chord progression, magical sparkle quality like Mario coin collection, Brazilian warmth and joy, encouraging achievement feeling, 1.5 seconds duration, mobile-optimized

Educational app gentle error indication: soft musical warning for children 7-11 years, helpful not startling, descending two-note melody with rounded smooth tone, xylophone or marimba quality, encouraging to try again, non-alarming supportive feedback, exactly 1 second

assets.description: soft musical warning for children 7-11 years

params.prompt: Child-friendly notification bell for educational app: gentle school bell inspired but softer, pleasant triangular chime, warm resonance, attention-getting without startling, Brazilian school context, friendly reminder quality, exactly 1 second duration

assets.description: gentle school bell inspired but softer

params.prompt: Educational achievement celebration fanfare: triumphant orchestral sound for children, brief celebratory fanfare, positive reinforcement for learning milestones, uplifting major key progression, Brazilian festive spirit without stereotypes, encouraging continued learning, 2.5 seconds duration

Modern smartphone camera capture sound for kids app: contemporary digital camera shutter click, crisp but not mechanical, friendly photo-taking feedback, familiar mobile phone camera sound, clean and satisfying, exactly 0.5 seconds
params.negative_prompt: old mechanical camera, film advance, electronic beep, harsh click

params.prompt: Smooth page turn transition for educational app: gentle paper sliding swoosh, airy page flip sound, book page turning quality, light and swift movement, story-time feeling, non-distracting navigation feedback, exactly 0.5 seconds
params.negative_prompt: harsh whoosh, windy, noisy, heavy bass, sharp swoosh

params.prompt: Playful bubble pop for children's interface: cartoon soap bubble bursting, light and delightful pop sound, fun interaction feedback, bouncy and soft quality, game-like satisfaction, child-appropriate playfulness, exactly 0.5 seconds
params.negative_prompt: loud pop, aggressive burst, sharp crack, balloon pop

params.prompt: Ambient thinking/processing loop for educational app: soft electronic thinking sound, gentle pulsing hum, AI assistant processing indication, soothing continuous background, seamless 3-second loop, calming waiting music, child-friendly technology sound
params.negative_prompt: harsh buzz, loud hum, distracting, annoying, anxiety-inducing

prompt_details.action: PROF mascot extremely happy and smiling, with joyful and welcoming expression, bright eyes, animated and inviting posture, in child-friendly cartoon style, vibrant colors, on clean white background

PROF mascot with curious and interested expression, wide eyes shining with discovery, slightly arched eyebrows, head subtly tilted, body posture leaning forward as if investigating something nearby, in friendly and educational cartoon style for children, vibrant colors, clean white background

PROF mascot in encouraging pose, smiling warmly with open arms in welcoming gesture, bright eyes conveying confidence, posture slightly leaning forward demonstrating interest and support, friendly and colorful cartoon style suitable for children, clean white background, centered composition with space for nearby elements

PROF mascot extremely animated and enthusiastic, with eyes shining with excitement, wide contagious smile, arms raised in celebration, dynamic posture transmitting positive energy, in child-friendly cartoon style, on clean white and neutral background

PROF mascot explaining educational concept with didactic hand gestures, attentive and friendly facial expression, engaged teacher posture, educational objects nearby (books, blackboard or learning elements), in colorful cartoon style suitable for children, clean white background

PROF mascot in thoughtful pose, hand on chin, contemplative gaze directed upward, concentrated but friendly expression, small thinking symbols (lightbulbs, gears or question marks) floating near head, educational cartoon style for children, vibrant colors, clean white background

PROF mascot in welcoming and inviting pose, open arms in welcome gesture, warm and friendly smile, bright eyes expressing kindness, open and receptive body posture, colorful cartoon style suitable for children, clean and minimalist white background, centered composition with balanced negative space

PROF mascot celebrating enthusiastically, arms raised in victory, extremely happy and proud facial expression, jumping with joy, colorful confetti around, in child-friendly cartoon style, vibrant and cheerful colors, clean white background, centered composition with space for dynamic movement

PROF mascot sleeping peacefully, closed eyes with serene and relaxed expression, breathing softly, comfortable and cozy position, small 'Zzz' floating above head, child-friendly cartoon style, soft and calming colors, clean white background

PROF mascot with positive and delighted surprise expression, wide eyes shining with curiosity, mouth open in 'O' shape, raised eyebrows, hands near face in admiration gesture, body posture slightly leaning forward demonstrating genuine interest, in friendly and expressive cartoon style for children, vibrant and cheerful colors, clean and crisp white background

params.animation_prompt: subtle breathing motion, seamless loop, character is mostly still

prompt_details.action: PROF mascot in friendly pose, standing still with book under arm, performing subtle and continuous natural breathing movement, chest expanding and contracting gently, perfect and imperceptible loop, character mostly static except for breathing, educational cartoon style for children

params.animation_prompt: a happy jump with a little squash and stretch

prompt_details.action: PROF mascot performing a joyful and expressive jump with smooth squash and stretch, starting from a crouched preparatory pose, propelling with contagious childlike energy, arms open in celebration during jump, landing with slight elastic compression, radiant smile throughout movement, fluid animation suitable for children 7-11 years, optional loop

assets.description: a happy jump with a little squash and stretch

params.animation_prompt: a friendly wave to the user

prompt_details.action: PROF mascot waving friendly to the user with one raised arm, smooth and welcoming movement, warm smile, gaze directed forward establishing visual connection, fluid 2-3 second animation with natural loop, educational cartoon style appropriate for children

assets.description: a friendly wave to the user

params.animation_prompt: tapping chin thoughtfully, a lightbulb appears and glows above head

prompt_details.action: PROF mascot tapping chin thoughtfully with curious and concentrated expression, eyes slightly looking upward, then a bright yellow lightbulb magically appears above head with 'eureka' effect, glowing and pulsing softly to indicate a brilliant idea, fluid and educational animation suitable for children

params.animation_prompt: jumping for joy, with confetti exploding around

prompt_details.action: PROF mascot jumping for joy with arms wide open, colorful confetti exploding around in celebration, energetic and expressive movement, radiant smile, fluid animation suitable for children, friendly and educational cartoon style

params.prompt: Pattern of colorful dots for children's educational app background. Vectorized, cartoon style, tileable pattern with playful dots in multiple bright colors
Pattern of cute stars for children's educational app background. Vectorized, cartoon style, tileable pattern with smiling stars in yellow and gold colors
Pattern of soft fluffy clouds for children's educational app background. Vectorized, cartoon style, tileable pattern with cute white clouds on light blue sky
School theme pattern for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, tileable pattern with pencils, books, rulers and ABC letters in bright colors

prompt_details.description: Smooth, soft, blue-purple gradient mesh background (1920x1080)
Smooth, soft, orange-pink gradient mesh background (1920x1080)

single, bright, sparkling star particle, golden yellow with white core, radiating soft light rays, glowing effect with subtle shimmer animation feel, clean vector-style design suitable for UI, on fully transparent background, 64x64 pixels, PNG format with alpha channel
A spritesheet of colorful confetti pieces, various shapes and colors, on a transparent background (512x512)

params.prompt: Decorative speech bubble shapes for children's app. Vectorized, cartoon style, friendly rounded bubble shapes with soft edges and playful design
Decorative rainbow arc for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, colorful rainbow with clouds at the ends, bright and cheerful design
Achievement badge frame in bronze for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, circular badge with decorative bronze border, shiny metallic effect
Achievement badge frame in silver for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, circular badge with decorative silver border, shiny metallic effect
Achievement badge frame in gold for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, circular badge with decorative gold border, stars decoration, shiny metallic effect

prompt_details.description: a soft, circular, golden glow effect for a badge, on a transparent background

params.prompt: Holiday decorations for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, festive ornaments, gift boxes, candy canes and holiday lights in bright colors
Spring seasonal pattern for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, flowers, butterflies, bees and green leaves in pastel colors
Autumn seasonal pattern for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, fall leaves, pumpkins, acorns in warm orange and brown colors
Birthday party elements for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, birthday cake, balloons, party hats, confetti in bright festive colors
Space theme elements for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon style, cute planets, stars, rockets, astronauts and aliens in bright colors
Icon of a camera for a educational kids educational app. Vectorized, cartoon, 3d, colorized.
Icon of a microphone for children's educational app. Vectorized, cartoon, 3d, colorful, fun design with musical notes
